selectedTextPlaceholder.message: Select text on the webpage or enter here

settingsDescription.message: Configure your search preferences and shortcuts

searchSettingsDescription.message: Configure backend API and query parameters

queryParamsDescription.message: Use the Key/Value list to add parameters. Values can be strings or JSON (objects or arrays); at least one field must contain {{QUERY}} for replacement.

shortcutDescription.message: Use Chrome's built-in shortcut management to configure shortcuts for this extension.

queryMustContainPlaceholder.message: Query parameters must contain the {{QUERY}} variable to be replaced in SidePanel.

invalidJson.message: Query parameters are not valid JSON, please correct and save.
